<!-- on the root element set the dir attribute for rtl display format -->
<html lang="en" dir="rtl">
    [code goes here]
</html>

<!-- html format stays the same -->
<h1>H1 - Locations Dropdown</h1>
<h2>H2 - Detail Page Heading</h2>
<h3>H3</h3>
<h4>H4 - Overall Form Title</h4>
<h5>H5 - Overall Form Title</h5>
<h6>H6 - Sub-Section Heading</h6>
<span class="breadcrumb"><a href="#">Linked Breadcrumb Styling</a></span>
<span class="breadcrumb">Unlinked Breadcrumb Styling</span>
<span class="table-entry">Table Cell Entries - Regular</span>
<a href="#" class="table-entry">Table Cell Entries - Linked Content</a>
<span class="table-entry-strong">Table Entries - Bolded Entry</span>
<span class="input-placeholder">Form Field - Placeholder Text</span>
<span class="input-text">Form Field - Completed Field</span>
    
    
// Typography 
// _typography-rtl.scss
// New sass partial created. Overrides only what is needed. It's included after the original buttons.scss styles.

// Font name
$font-name-2:           'NotoSans';

// Font family
$font-family-2:         $font-name-2, sans-serif;

// Font imports

// noto

@font-face {
  font-family: $font-name-2;
  src: url('../fonts/#{ $font-name }-Regular.ttf');
  font-weight:400;
}
@font-face {
    font-family: $font-name-2;
    src: url('../fonts/#{ $font-name }-Bold.ttf');
    font-weight:700;
}


// Font weight classes
.noto-bold {
    font-family: '#{ $font-name-2 }'; 
    font-weight: $font-bold;
}

.noto-regular {
    font-family: '#{ $font-name-2 }'; 
    font-weight: $font-regular;
}

// Headings, elements with role of headings
html[dir="rtl"] h1, 
html[dir="rtl"] .h1-role {
    font-family:    $font-family-2;
    font-size:      $font-size-30;
    line-height:    $line-height-30;
    font-weight:    $font-bold;
    color:          $deep-blue;
}

html[dir="rtl"] h2, 
html[dir="rtl"] .h2-role {
    font-family:    $font-family-2;
    font-size:      $font-size-24;
    line-height:    $line-height-24;
    font-weight:    $font-medium;
    color:          $deep-blue;
}

html[dir="rtl"] h3, 
html[dir="rtl"] .h3-role {
    font-family:    $font-family-2;
    font-size:      $font-size-18;
    line-height:    $line-height-18;
    font-weight:    $font-regular;
    color:          $deep-blue;
}

html[dir="rtl"] h4, 
html[dir="rtl"] .h4-role {
    font-family:    $font-family-2;
    font-size:      $font-size-16;
    line-height:    $line-height-16;
    font-weight:    $font-regular;
    color:          $deep-blue;
}

html[dir="rtl"] h5, 
html[dir="rtl"] .h5-role {
    font-family:    $font-family-2;
    font-size:      $font-size-14;
    line-height:    $line-height-16;
    font-weight:    $font-medium;
    color:          $deep-blue;
    text-transform: uppercase;
}

html[dir="rtl"] h6, 
html[dir="rtl"] .h6-role {
    font-family:    $font-family-2;
    font-size:      $font-size-12;
    line-height:    $line-height-16;
    font-weight:    $font-medium;
    color:          $deep-blue;
}

// Table entries styles
html[dir="rtl"] .table-entry {
    font-family:    $font-family-2;
    font-size:      $font-size-14;
    line-height:    $line-height-16;
    color:          $dark-grey;
}

html[dir="rtl"] .table-entry-strong {
    font-family:    $font-family-2;
    font-size:      $font-size-14;
    line-height:    $line-height-16;
    color:          $dark-grey;
    font-weight:    $font-bold;
}

html[dir="rtl"] .breadcrumb {
    font-family:    $font-family-2;
    font-size:      $font-size-18;
    color:          $deep-blue;
}

html[dir="rtl"] .table-entry {
    font-size: $font-size-14;
    color: $dark-grey;
}


// Input and placeholders style
html[dir="rtl"] .input-placeholder {
    font-family:    $font-family-2;
    font-size:      $font-size-14;
    line-height:    $line-height-16;
    color:          $medium-grey;
}

html[dir="rtl"] .input-text {
    font-family:    $font-family-2;
    font-size:      $font-size-14;
    line-height:    $line-height-16;
    color:          $dark-grey;
}
